primary_type.title: Primary dither pattern type
primary_type.description: NIRCam primary dither pattern type: full, fullbox, full-tight, intramodule, intramodulebox, intramodulex, intrasca, subarray-dither, wfsc, none.

pattern_size.title: Primary dither pattern size
pattern_size.description: NIRCAM dither pattern size: NONE, SMALL, MEDIUM, or LARGE.

total_points.title: Total number of points in pattern
total_points.description: NIRCam total number of points in primary dither pattern, extracted from dither_points string: 1-25, 27, 36, 45
total_points.misc: PPS refers to number of steps (numbers and strings)

dither_points.title: Number and type of dither points
dither_points.description: NIRCam total number of points in primary dither pattern, e.g., 1-25, 27, 36, 45, 2MINUS, 2PLUS, 2TIGHTGAPS, 3TIGHT, 3TIGHTGAPS
dither_points.misc: PPS refers to number of steps (numbers and strings)

subpixel_total_points.title: Total number of points in subpixel dither pattern
subpixel_total_points.description: NIRCam total number of points in subpixel dither pattern: 1-64
subpixel_total_points.misc: PPS defines as number of secondary dither positions with range 1-64. Chris data typo 'fgs

subpixel_pattern_type.title: Subpixel dither pattern type
subpixel_pattern_type.description: name of the sub-pixel dither pattern chosen for NIRCam WFSS or for coordinated parallels with NIRCam prime

x_offset.title: x offset from pattern starting position
x_offset.description: x offset from pattern starting position (arcsec): -84.476 to 87.276
x_offset.calculation: Lookup x offset in the PRD dither table for dither point.  Sum primary and subpixel dither offsets. For PATTTYPE = intrasca, the PPS database fields ppsdb:nircam_imaging_dither:dither_size and  ppsdb:nircam_imaging_dither:camera are needed to read the PRD dither tables.  The dither size can be small, medium, or large.  For camera = short, read the table directly.  For camera = long, multiply the table offset values by a factor of 2.
x_offset.source: Science and Operations Center Project Reference Database (PRD)

y_offset.title: y offset from pattern starting position
y_offset.description: y offset from pattern starting position (arcsec): -61.480 to 62.260
y_offset.calculation: Lookup y offset in the PRD dither table for dither point.  Sum primary and subpixel dither offsets. For PATTTYPE = intrasca, the PPS database fields ppsdb:nircam_imaging_dither:dither_size and  ppsdb:nircam_imaging_dither:camera are needed to read the PRD dither tables.  The dither size can be small, medium, or large.  For camera = short, read the table directly.  For camera = long, multiply the table offset values by a factor of 2.
y_offset.source: Science and Operations Center Project Reference Database (PRD)
